Teaching at your LYS

Individual instructors or LYS may buy a teaching license. I offer them for each pattern, but I do give discounts after you buy 3 single licenses. Purchasing a Course Instruction License grants you the right to teach an unlimited number of courses from one pattern youâ€™ve selected, and to give each student with a printed copy of the pattern.

Available Single Pattern Licenses

Each license is good for one pattern only. Note that this means single patterns, not ebook publications.

One class
$25
License for one pattern for one class session.
One year unlimited
$100
License for one pattern, unlimited class sessions for one year from date of agreement.
After 3 years of this license, it becomes a lifetime license.
Lifetime unlimited
$250
License for one pattern, unlimited class sessions for life.
Licenses include:
  • Legal rights to print 1 copy of each pattern and distribute to students.
  • Access to pattern updates.
  • Legal right to teach for profit at your own price point.

Hiring me to teach

I offer single-day workshops in the Chicagoland area. Rates vary depending on the workshop.

I don't have as much availability for workshops, classes, or speaking engagements that require traveling. I love to travel and teach, but I can only accept a few engagements a year with my work schedule. Engagements that require travel will require additional workshops and compensation for travel (unless it coincides with a personal/work trip).

Trunk shows

I only do trunk shows in person. Sorry!

About pattern purchases

Patterns are sold as downloadable PDF files through Ravelry, with payments processed by PayPal. You do not need an account to use either service.

If you have a Ravelry account, I suggest logging in prior to purchasing so that patterns are added to your library.

Get pattern help

Pattern support is provided free of charge for all of my patterns. We respond as quickly as possible, but sometimes it can take a day or two.

Submit a new help request through Zendesk.

You can also use Zendesk to report errors and ask non-technical questions.

Alternatively, you can try the Ravelry group.

Support is only provided via Zendesk.

FAQ

Can I teach a class using your knitting pattern?

Teaching licensing is temporarily on hold and should resume in 2014.

Can I sell items made using your knitting patterns for profit or charity?

Not at this time.

How do I order wholesale copies for my LYS?

Pattern wholesaling is temporarily on hold and should resume in 2014.

I found an error, how do I report it?

Oh newts! Submit your error through Zendesk and we will fix it.

Happy knitting!
